languages.text: "Ересь? Ксеносы?" {n}Секретарь осеняет себя защитным знаком.{/n} "Да охранит нас Бог-Император! Ваша Светлость, вы спасли нас от верной гибели, не иначе! Мы немедленно проведем тщательнейшие проверки и отыщем оставшихся заговорщиков и предателей!"

traits.locale_text: "Ересь? Ксеносы?" {n}Секретарь осеняет себя защитным знаком.{/n} "Да охранит нас Бог-Император! Ваша Светлость, вы спасли нас от верной гибели, не иначе! Мы немедленно проведем тщательнейшие проверки и отыщем оставшихся заговорщиков и предателей!"

languages.text: "Heresy? Xenos?" {n}The secretary makes a protective gesture in the air.{/n} "God-Emperor preserve us! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you have surely saved us from our doom! We will immediately begin scouring the planet to root out any remaining conspirators and traitors!"
languages.original_text: "Ересь? Ксеносы?" {n}Секретарь осеняет себя защитным знаком.{/n} "Да охранит нас Бог-Император! Ваша Светлость, вы спасли нас от верной гибели, не иначе! Мы немедленно проведем тщательнейшие проверки и отыщем оставшихся заговорщиков и предателей!"

traits.locale_text: "Heresy? Xenos?" {n}The secretary makes a protective gesture in the air.{/n} "God-Emperor preserve us! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you have surely saved us from our doom! We will immediately begin scouring the planet to root out any remaining conspirators and traitors!"

"Heresy? Xenos?" {n}The secretary makes a protective gesture in the air.{/n} "God-Emperor preserve us! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you have surely saved us from our doom! We will immediately begin scouring the planet to root out any remaining conspirators and traitors!"

"Heresy? Xenos?" {n}The secretary makes a protective gesture in the air.{/n} "God-Emperor preserve us! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you have surely saved us from our doom! We will immediately begin scouring the planet to root out any remaining conspirators and traitors!"

"Heresy? Xenos?" {n}The secretary makes a protective gesture in the air.{/n} "God-Emperor preserve us! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you have surely saved us from our doom! We will immediately begin scouring the planet to root out any remaining conspirators and traitors!"

languages.text: “异端分子？还有异形？”{n}秘书在空中做了个祈祷的手势。{/n}“愿神皇保佑我们！大人，您真的是将我们从劫难中解救了出来！我们会立刻搜查这颗行星，将所有残存的阴谋分子与叛徒彻底铲除！”
languages.original_text: "Heresy? Xenos?" {n}The secretary makes a protective gesture in the air.{/n} "God-Emperor preserve us! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you have surely saved us from our doom! We will immediately begin scouring the planet to root out any remaining conspirators and traitors!"

traits.locale_text: “异端分子？还有异形？”{n}秘书在空中做了个祈祷的手势。{/n}“愿神皇保佑我们！大人，您真的是将我们从劫难中解救了出来！我们会立刻搜查这颗行星，将所有残存的阴谋分子与叛徒彻底铲除！”

languages.text: «¿Herejes? ¿Y xenos?». {n}El secretario hace un gesto de protección.{/n} «¡Que el Dios Emperador nos guarde! Mi{mf|lord|lady}, ¡no cabe duda de que nos ha salvado a todos! ¡Empezaremos a registrar el planeta para erradicar cualquier conspirador o traidor que pueda quedar!».
languages.original_text: "Heresy? Xenos?" {n}The secretary makes a protective gesture in the air.{/n} "God-Emperor preserve us! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you have surely saved us from our doom! We will immediately begin scouring the planet to root out any remaining conspirators and traitors!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Herejes? ¿Y xenos?». {n}El secretario hace un gesto de protección.{/n} «¡Que el Dios Emperador nos guarde! Mi{mf|lord|lady}, ¡no cabe duda de que nos ha salvado a todos! ¡Empezaremos a registrar el planeta para erradicar cualquier conspirador o traidor que pueda quedar!».

languages.text: 「異端者？異種族？」{n}秘書官は身を守るように宙で手を振る仕草をする。{/n}「神帝陛下よお守りください！陛下、我々を運命から救ってくださったのですね！ただちに残りの陰謀者と謀反人を一掃してこの星を掃除しましょう！」
languages.original_text: "Heresy? Xenos?" {n}The secretary makes a protective gesture in the air.{/n} "God-Emperor preserve us! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you have surely saved us from our doom! We will immediately begin scouring the planet to root out any remaining conspirators and traitors!"

traits.locale_text: 「異端者？異種族？」{n}秘書官は身を守るように宙で手を振る仕草をする。{/n}「神帝陛下よお守りください！陛下、我々を運命から救ってくださったのですね！ただちに残りの陰謀者と謀反人を一掃してこの星を掃除しましょう！」

languages.text: "Ketzerei? Xenos?" {n}Der Sekretär macht eine schützende Geste in der Luft.{/n} "Der Gottimperator bewahre uns! Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, Ihr habt uns vor dem sicheren Untergang bewahrt! Wir werden den Planeten umgehend durchkämmen und alle verbliebenen Verschwörer und Verräter ausmerzen!"
languages.original_text: "Heresy? Xenos?" {n}The secretary makes a protective gesture in the air.{/n} "God-Emperor preserve us! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you have surely saved us from our doom! We will immediately begin scouring the planet to root out any remaining conspirators and traitors!"

traits.locale_text: "Ketzerei? Xenos?" {n}Der Sekretär macht eine schützende Geste in der Luft.{/n} "Der Gottimperator bewahre uns! Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, Ihr habt uns vor dem sicheren Untergang bewahrt! Wir werden den Planeten umgehend durchkämmen und alle verbliebenen Verschwörer und Verräter ausmerzen!"

languages.text: « De l'hérésie ? Des xénos ? Que l'Empereur nous préserve ! {n}s'exclame le secrétaire en faisant un signe protecteur.{/n} Vous nous avez sauvés d'un grand péril, Votre Seigneurie ! Nous allons immédiatement passer la planète au peigne fin pour débusquer tous les conspirateurs et les traîtres qui auraient pu passer entre les mailles du filet ! »
languages.original_text: "Heresy? Xenos?" {n}The secretary makes a protective gesture in the air.{/n} "God-Emperor preserve us! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you have surely saved us from our doom! We will immediately begin scouring the planet to root out any remaining conspirators and traitors!"

traits.locale_text: « De l'hérésie ? Des xénos ? Que l'Empereur nous préserve ! {n}s'exclame le secrétaire en faisant un signe protecteur.{/n} Vous nous avez sauvés d'un grand péril, Votre Seigneurie ! Nous allons immédiatement passer la planète au peigne fin pour débusquer tous les conspirateurs et les traîtres qui auraient pu passer entre les mailles du filet ! »

languages.text: "Kâfirlik mi? Zenolar mı?" {n}Yazman, eliyle havada bir korunma işareti çiziyor.{/n} "Tanrı İmparator bizi korusun! {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, bizi ölümden kurtardığınıza şüphe yok! Geride kalmış komplocuların ve hainlerin kökünü kazımak için şu andan itibaren gezegendeki girilmemiş delik bırakmayacağız!"
languages.original_text: "Heresy? Xenos?" {n}The secretary makes a protective gesture in the air.{/n} "God-Emperor preserve us! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you have surely saved us from our doom! We will immediately begin scouring the planet to root out any remaining conspirators and traitors!"

traits.locale_text: "Kâfirlik mi? Zenolar mı?" {n}Yazman, eliyle havada bir korunma işareti çiziyor.{/n} "Tanrı İmparator bizi korusun! {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, bizi ölümden kurtardığınıza şüphe yok! Geride kalmış komplocuların ve hainlerin kökünü kazımak için şu andan itibaren gezegendeki girilmemiş delik bırakmayacağız!"
